Interface ServerManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerManagerImpl

    public interface ServerManager
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Interface to setup the Server Manager - that is the main port of contact
    Author:
    mikieJ
